group_1.textRight: What is it you are doing?

group_1.textLeft: I'm reading up on Halloween spirit.

group_1.textRight: But you're just rereading your favorite@manga, no?

group_1.textLeft: You're wrong!
"Trick and Treat: The Miracle of Devil@Purification"...
This is the 30th volume, around the time I became@a Magical Girl,
and it was a huge inspiration for me!

group_1.textRight: In other words, the volume where fool girl@plagiarized the setting?

group_1.textLeft: Senpai, you couldn't be any more blunt...
But anyway, within this story
is everything I can think of when it comes to@Halloween spirit.
If I use this as reference, I'll bring out the best@feelings of Halloween.
I'm totally sure Kaede will be left utterly speechless!

group_1.textRight: You are in a good mood today too, aren't you?@It's such a relief.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101202:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...!
... I don't understand, but I feel like you're@making fun of me!

group_1.textRight: Fool girl is really foolish you know...
This is not only to get discharged, but also for rehabilitation,
so don't look down on her indiscriminately and@offer her some proper advice, please.

group_1.textLeft: No, I can't.
Alina knows nothing of painting to prove@oneself to others.
If you want to be recognized by the gallery,@then instead of relying on Alina,
don't you think you should ask the opinion@of the gallery?
[chara:101202:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
... I hadn't thought of that.
I thought that
if I could draw manga that feels like the greatest@Halloween spirit to me,
that everyone else would feel the same way...
So to return to my roots I started reading@Magical Kirin again.

group_1.textRight: ... Certainly, you cannot know what others@will think of the outcome

group_1.textLeft: That's right!
The way one's self feels is different from others...@That's something very important!
If I want to prove myself to Kaede by showing my Halloween spirit,
I've gotta meet my readers halfway there!
Thanks so much for the advice, Alina-senpai!

group_1.textRight: Alina didn't mean to give you advice though?

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe...@It's a little nostalgic.
It feels like before you lost your memory, senpai,
when you would be all stuck-up and give me the@perfect guidance I needed...

group_1.textRight: Almost as if everything were okay.
And I did hear that Kaede's trio would be paying@a visit today as well.

group_1.textLeft: Talk about good timing!
This is my chance to hear Kaede and her friends'@opinions
about what Halloween feels like in person!

group_1.textRight: I am certain Momoko would love to hear that.
